title: Making progress
text: Lots of potential. pretty basic functionality, perfect for adjusting speaker volumes. doesn‚Äôt play back music from apple music, but will from the local library. internet radio functionality is dubious, but maybe some people enjoy it ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

title: Great app
text: Needs to be update for iOS 11 compatibility!!!!!

title: Horrible app for Jongo A2
text: Crash when swipe for QNAP NAS. Ugly look, function useless. Unsuitable for a hi tech player.

title: Seriously degraded ‚Äúupdate‚Äù
text:
I have two Pure radios, whose station list I built and managed with Pure Connect, first on a website until that was discontinued, then on the Pure Connect app. 

This app had problems with iOS 11, but now it‚Äôs back - without the radio functionality! Now it wants to turn my two radios into a stereo pair of speakers. Which is useless because, among other things, one of these is a stereo radio. 

I don‚Äôt have standalone speakers, I have radios. And I would like functioning stations again.

title: The worst experience ever!!!!!
text: The Bluetooth functionality is the worst possible connection ever for multiple speakers. I have 4 speakers, wrote to the company rand ga ding an update because I lost all functionality. Now I get this with no WiFi functionality and ‚Äúupdates soon‚Äù message of hope in December. It is January 2018 and app lost WiFi connectivity last summer.  Now I know that it is preferable to slit ones wrists before purchasing or recommending another pure product!

title: No multi room nor any features
text:
This version does absolutely nothing it serves literally no purpose. 

Like always you could already hook up to a single speaker through the settings app. But, now with this version it will show a list of all of your speakers but it will only play to one. What???

Hey developer team, you aren‚Äôt fooling anyone. We bought these speakers and would like to use them for what we bought them for. 

And by the way, removing all features and services probably wasn‚Äôt the most subtle change. Maybe mention what is going on in your version update section next time? And while you‚Äôre at it, give the features BACK! 

I‚Äôm at a loss for words of PURE at this point.

title: Worst speaker and app ever.
text: This is the stupidest thing I've ever worked with. The directions help you with what is suppose to work it doesn't tell you what to do when it doesn't work. It just tells you to keep trying. I've spent two hours now trying to get this stupid speaker connected to my wifi network. I got it twice but then it would not pair with my device.

title: Thanks Pure!
text:
The description clearly says, ‚Äúmore features coming soon,‚Äù so calm down.

Also, the Pure Select App seems like an improvement on the original Pure app‚Äôs radio features.

title: Out of sync vids
text: For such expensive speakers to have vid soundtrack out of sync is a deal breaker. As well the wifi synching is too complicated and does not recognize hidden ssid's. And last but not least an expensive and clunky app for streaming. jam box and pandora or another streaming service and no issues with vid sound sync...

title: Issue
text:
Please bring back the radio section to this app I can‚Äôt use the WiFi part of the app with out that radio section. So please bring it back so I can us this speaker to is full potential. 

I‚Äôm thinking of getting rid of the jongo because of this update I can‚Äôt do anything

title: Great app
text: Very good and it has a lot of variety

title: Pure connect
text: Pease update your app to be compatible with ios11. I miss not hearing your great app.

title: Burned
text: This is the worst app. Absolutely horrible the same goes for the Jongo.  They represent it as a less expensive Sonos but it's not even close. Can't use pandora with the product and not friendly

title: iOS 11 update?
text: While I can use my Bluetooth on my jongo speaker, I would prefer to actually use it how it is supposed to be utilized. Please add 64 bit support so that I can continue to use my jongo as designed!

title: The App Doesn‚Äôt Load in iOS 11
text:
The App developer hasn‚Äôt complied with the iOS 11 update. The developer claims it‚Äôs ‚Äúoutside their control‚Äù, yet all other developers have complied.

I now have $1200 speakers that are rendered useless. 

Pure App people: FIX IT

title: Too complicated
text: The software locks up, is too complicated to use..I wish i had never bought the speaker..can't find the PC software..

title: Radio in 2014
text: This app would not even let me sign in to my account. It's nearly 2014. It shouldn't be so difficult to listen to music on a radio.

title: Worst set up instructions
text: I have probably invested six hours trying to set this up with no luck.  This is a serious pos. Don't buy

title: Getting Better
text: The recent iOS update that allows you to Bluetooth pair speakers with one selection instead of going into the settings for each speaker is the best one yet! Doing the same Thing for Android would be awesome! Removing all the nonfunctional music stations would be worth another star. Keep moving upward!

title: Please fix
text: Does not work, keeps crashing!

Please update app!!! I cannot use my speakers since my last IPhone update. Thank you.
